name: Ridiculous Randomness
description:
Play stupid game

also use w / b to jump, a and d / joystick to move, q / x to do move, space / press left joystick to use special, right joystick for controller cursor, any unused button (L recomended) for controller click, t / - to see the loadout again (if you forgor), enter / + to pause, and r / r to heal.

i made this for school project but yeeeee i overdid myself
